featured.text: D. Daniel To me, a zoo can be a good place for endangered species which have difficulty finding suitable mates in the wild.
Fireflies, small beetles that live in many warmer parts of the world, use light to attract a mate.
Male howler monkeys use their loud voices to fight for food, mates, or territory.
They mate at night near railways.

definition.en_def: A companion or friend, often used to refer to a partner in a romantic or close relationship.
definition.example: He decided to take his mate to the concert.
